cause.description:
Groups like this help families out, that have lost a child either though Preganices right though adult hood. Losing a child is a very hard thing to go to. Most people don't understand the pain that you go though when you have lost.
Groups like this help out families so they can talk with other families that have lost as well.
1. To help keep this prgram running, so families can recive support that they need when lossing a child.
cause.mission: to help rasie money for a non profit group. That helps out families everyday with the loss of a loved one.
cause.name: Bereaved Families
